```{r warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
require(dplyr)
require(ggplot2)
```


```{r}
# CREATE NULL DISTRIBUTIONS of clusters of (1) all spiders and (2) spiders who clustered. Uses 2014 data.
# (1) all spiders can cluster
nullDist <- c()

for(i in 1:1000){
  randCluster <- spiders %>%
    filter(Year == 2014) %>%
    sample_n(7, replace = FALSE)
  
  clusterStats <- randCluster %>%
    summarise(meanSize = mean(SpiderSizemm), sdSize = sd(SpiderSizemm), maxSize = max(SpiderSizemm), minSize = min(SpiderSizemm))
  
  nullDist <- rbind(nullDist, cbind(t(randCluster$SpiderSizemm), clusterStats))
}

# (2) only use spiders that originally clustered
nullDist2 <- c()

for(i in 1:1000){
  randCluster <- spiders %>%
    filter(Year == 2014, startsWith(WebID, 'C')) %>%
    sample_n(7, replace = FALSE)
  
  clusterStats <- randCluster %>%
    summarise(meanSize = mean(SpiderSizemm), sdSize = sd(SpiderSizemm), maxSize = max(SpiderSizemm), minSize = min(SpiderSizemm))
  
  nullDist2 <- rbind(nullDist2, cbind(t(randCluster$SpiderSizemm), clusterStats))
}

#ANALYSIS
# the actual clusters
clusters14 <- spiders %>%
  filter(Year == 2014, startsWith(WebID, 'C')) %>%
  group_by(WebID) %>%
  summarise(meanSize = mean(SpiderSizemm), sdSize = sd(SpiderSizemm), maxSize = max(SpiderSizemm), minSize = min(SpiderSizemm)) %>%
  filter(!is.na(sdSize))

# analysis by aggregating the actual clusters
meanNull1SD = mean(nullDist$sdSize)     # 1.24 average SD for random clusters of all spiders
meanNull2SD = mean(nullDist2$sdSize)    # 1.27 average SD for random clusters of spiders who clustered
meanActualSD = mean(clusters14$sdSize)  # 0.92 average SD of actual clusters

pSD = 2*sum(nullDist$sdSize<meanActualSD)/1000   # 0.66 proportion of random clusters of all spiders whose SDs were more extreme
pSD2 = 2*sum(nullDist2$sdSize<meanActualSD)/1000 # 0.78 proportion of random clusters of clustered spiders whose SDs were more extreme


# analysis on each actual cluster
pSDnull1 <- c()
pSDnull2 <- c()

for(cluster in 1:61){
  pSDnull1 <- c(pSDnull1, 2*sum(nullDist$sdSize<clusters14$sdSize[cluster])/1000)
  pSDnull2 <- c(pSDnull2, 2*sum(nullDist2$sdSize<clusters14$sdSize[cluster])/1000)
}

mean(pSDnull1) # 0.63 average p-value from the actual clusters based on null1
mean(pSDnull2) # 0.67 average p-value from the actual clusters based on null2

```
